meanings.definition: A person who speaks or sings
meanings.sent1: The voicers in the choir sang beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The voicers at the town hall meeting expressed their opinions.
meanings.sent3: The voicers at the animal shelter talked to the dogs to comfort them.
meanings.sent4: The voicers of nature filled the forest with their songs.
meanings.sent5: The voicers in the play brought the characters to life with their words.

meanings.definition: The sound produced by speaking or singing
meanings.sent1: The voicers of the wind rustled the leaves in the trees.
meanings.sent2: The voicers of the children playing echoed through the park.
meanings.sent3: The voicers of the old radio crackled with static.
meanings.sent4: The voicers of the waves crashing against the shore soothed her mind.
meanings.sent5: The voicers of the birds chirping signaled the start of a new day.
